backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining blood donation platform types (BloodGroup, UserProfile, BloodRequest, ActiveLocation) and implementing profile management, blood request CRUD operations, donor matching, and location tracking with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of location tracking functionality across LocationTrackingPage component, routing, navigation, and map marker display for donors and blood requests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities for the blood donation platform.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes for UI components including primary, secondary, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Google Maps JavaScript API with Places library and mounting React application at root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, auth, blood request/donation, dashboard, profile, chat, request details, and location tracking pages wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BloodRequestCard: Card component displaying blood request details with formatted blood group, urgency/status badges, location, timestamp, and view details button with color-coded urgency and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/CreateBloodReque: Form component for creating blood requests with blood group selection, urgency level dropdown, Google Maps place picker for location, and submission handling with validation and success callbacks.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: A reusable card component that displays an icon, title, and description with hover effects for showcasing features.
frontend/src/components/GoogleMapsPlaceP: An autocomplete location picker component that integrates with Google Maps Places API to extract address, city, latitude, and longitude from user input.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component with navigation, footer, and conditional profile setup modal that renders when authenticated users lack a profile.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation header with logo, authenticated/unauthenticated menu links, and mobile sheet menu with login button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileForm.tsx: Form component for editing user profile including name, blood group, location (via Google Maps picker), contact preferences, and availability toggle.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Non-dismissible modal dialog for first-time profile setup requiring name, blood group, role, location, and contact preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication and admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateBloodRequest: Mutation hook for creating blood requests with blood group, location, and urgency parameters, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetActiveLocations: Query hook that fetches active location data with 30-second auto-refresh interval for real-time tracking updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile, returning null if no profile exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetMatchingRequest: React Query hook that filters and returns blood requests matching the current user's blood donation compatibility, excluding their own requests and only showing pending requests.
React Query hook that retrieves details for a specific blood request by ID from the user's requests list.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetUserRequests.ts: React Query hook that fetches all blood requests associated with the currently authenticated user's principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook for fetching all blood requests (currently returns empty array as placeholder).
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: React Query mutation hook that saves the current user's profile to the backend and invalidates the profile cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateAvailability: React Query mutation hook that updates the user's blood donation availability status by saving their profile with the new availability flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateRequestStatu: React Query mutation hook that updates a blood request's status and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for admin dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Authentication page that displays login UI and redirects authenticated users with profiles to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/BloodDonationPage.tsx: Page for donors to manage their availability status and view matching blood requests they can fulfill based on blood type compatibility.
frontend/src/pages/BloodRequestPage.tsx: Page for users to create new blood requests and view/manage their existing requests with a collapsible form interface.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Placeholder chat page with UI shell for future messaging functionality between donors and receivers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying user profile information, availability toggle, and blood requests with edit functionality. Redirects unauthenticated users to auth page.
frontend/src/pages/DonorDashboard.tsx: Empty file, likely a placeholder for donor-specific dashboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards, and how-it-works explanation. Redirects authenticated users with profiles to dashboard.
Google Maps integration page displaying active donor and blood request locations with markers, info windows, and real-time tracking. Requires authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Dedicated profile management page allowing users to view and edit their personal information including blood group, location, and contact preferences.
frontend/src/pages/ReceiverDashboard.tsx: Empty file, likely a placeholder for receiver-specific dashboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RequestDetailsPage.ts: Detailed view of a blood request showing urgency, status, location, and matched donor information with status update functionality for authorized users.
frontend/src/types/google-maps.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Google Maps JavaScript API including Autocomplete, LatLng, LatLngBounds, and Places interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/bloodGroupUtils.ts: Utility functions for formatting blood group display strings and checking blood type compatibility between donors and receivers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for BloodLine, a real-time blood donation platform with React frontend, RESTful backend, role-based access control (Donor/Receiver/Admin), Google Maps integration, and features for user authentication, profile management, blood requests, and location-based matching.
